channel.title: National on TJNU-iOS-Club
channel.description: Recent content in National on TJNU-iOS-Club

item.title: [Project] Hierachical Attention for Speech Emotion Recognition
item.description: Using hierarchical attention mechanisms at the level of sentences and words to improve the accuracy of speech emotion recognition. This project is supported by National Natural Science Foundation.

item.title: [Project] Campus intelligent auditing system based on Deep Learning and WeChat Applet
item.description: 2018 Tianjin School level National Undergraduate Training Programs for Innovation and Entrepreneurship.

item.title: [Project] Depression Detection Software Based on Speech and Tune
item.description: 2017 Tianjin Province level National Undergraduate Training Programs for Innovation and Entrepreneurship.
